translations: adj.异位的；异位素的；异原子序的

phrs.translation: 异位骨化, 异位性骨化, 异位性骨化症, 异位骨化症
异位妊娠, 异位方, 外同时妊娠, 宫内外同时妊娠
异位胰组织, 胃胰腺组织异位
异位肝移植, 次运用异位辅助肝移植, 异位辅助肝移植, 肝移植

sentences.sentence: Models of segmental heterotopic small intestine transplantation were established using three sleevelet vascular anastomosis.
sentences.translation: 采用三袖套血管吻合法建立大鼠节段性异位小肠移植模型。

sentences.sentence: Methods the microsurgery technique was used to develop method of heterotopic heart transplantation in the rat abdomen.
sentences.translation: 方法以显微外科手术技术建立异位大鼠心脏移植模型。

sentences.sentence: The condition, called heterotopic ossification, occurs when an area of the body is signaled to grow bone rather than other tissues.
sentences.translation: 这种情况，被称为异位骨化，是由于身体的某块区域发出长骨头的信号，而不是生长其他组织。
